{{infobox shopping mall | | shopping_mall_name = SM City Marilao | image = SM City Marilao Logo.png | image_width = 200px | caption = ''"We've got it all for you!"''
''"The first SM Supermall in Bulacan province"'' | location = MacArthur Highway, Brgy. Ibayo, [[Marilao]], [[Bulacan]], Philippines | opening_date = November 28, 2003 | developer = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | manager = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | owner = [[Henry Sy|Henry Sy, Sr.]] | number_of_buildings = 1 | number_of_stores = 300+ shops | number_of_anchors = 12 | floor_area = 88,654 square meters | floors = 2 | website = [http://smsupermalls.com/smsupermalls/index.php?p=651&mall=18 SM City Marilao Official Website] }} '''SM City Marilao''' is a major mall owned and operated by [[SM Prime Holdings]]. It is on MacArthur Highway, Brgy. Ibayo, Marilao, Bulacan, Philippines. This is the first [[SM Supermall]] in Bulacan Province with a land area of 203,000 sq.m and a floor area of 88,654 sq.m. == Anchors == * SM Department Store * SM Hypermarket * SM Cinemas * SM Food Court == Junior Anchors == *[[Ace Hardware]] *[[Toy Kingdom]] *[[National Bookstore]] *[[Watsons]] *SM Appliance Center *Our Home == See also == *[[SM City Southmall]] *[[SM Megamall]] *[[SM City Fairview]] *[[SM City Baliwag]] *[[SM City North EDSA]] *Centris Station == External links == *[http://www.smprime.com/ SM Prime Holdings] {{S-start}} {{S-bef|before=[[SM City Baguio]]}} {{s-ttl|title=17th ''[[SM Supermalls|SM Supermall]]''|years=2003}} {{s-aft|after=[[SM City DasmariÃ±as]]}} {{S-end}} {{SMPH}} {{Navbox |name = SM Department Store |title = [[SM Department Store|{{color|#FFFFFF|SM Department Store}}]] |titlestyle = background:#0000A0; color:#FFFFFF |groupstyle = background::#0000A0; color:#0000A0 |group1 = Branches:|Upcoming Branches: |list2 = {{nowrap begin}} [[SM City Consolacion|Consolacion, Cebu]]{{Â·w}} [[SM City Taguig|Fort Bonifacio]]{{Â·w}} [[SM City North Davao|Lanang]]{{nowrap end}} }} {{Navbox |name = SM Hypermarket Branches |title = [[SM Hypermarket|{{color|#0000A0|SM Hypermarket}}]] |titlegroup = |titlestyle = background:#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |groupstyle = background::#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |group1 = Branches:|
